name: Sarah's story
description:
There is an error that games made with RenPy do not work properly in Chrome browsers and their base browsers. I think this problem will be solved soon. But if not,  you can play this  game using the methods below.

1. Use another browser such as 'Firefox'

Firefox download link. https://www.mozilla.org/firefox/new/

2. Download and play the game to your personal computer.

https://davidgeun.itch.io/64532
